options.text: Azure Defender for SQL protects your SQL servers both inside and outside of Azure by providing vulnerability assessment solution to help discover and remediate security vulnerabilities and an advanced threat detection capabilities to detect real-time threats on your SQL servers. Combine Azure Defender for SQL and Microsoft Sentinel detection, response and investigation capabilities to extract the most addon-value out of Azure Native protection for SQL Servers.
